text: Jordi Gordillo Brunet (born August 16, 1983 in Barcelona) is a swimmer from Spain. He has a disability: He has cerebral palsy and is an S5 type swimmer. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in Athens, Greece. He finished third in the 4 x 50 meter 20 point medley relay. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in Beijing, China. He finished second in the 4 x 50 meter 20 point medley relay. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S5
title: Jordi Gordillo Brunet
